gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 106, Grizzlies 94
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Grizzlies, 106-94. Julius Randle led the Knicks with 24 points, 11 rebounds, and five assists as Miles McBride (career-high 19 points, six rebounds, five assists) and OG Anunoby (18 points, five rebounds) totaled 37 points.  Isaiah Hartenstein has 12 points and 20 rebounds for New York. GG Jackson led Memphis with a career-high 20 points and six rebounds. The Knicks improve to 23-16 on the year as the Grizzlies move to 14-25.
